text_show:
ABAMMEGANYI be ssaza lya Butambala bamaze okutendekebwa ne bawera okumegga amasaza amalala gonna nti kuba bayungudde ba musaayi muto bokka.
Okusinziira ku mutendesi w’omuzannyo gwe kigo ggumbya ekya Bukedde Saadi Ssebalemba ategeezezza nti abazannyibe bonna beetegese bulungi era nti bakomekkereza okutendekebwa basobole okufuna akaseera k'okuwummula batuuke ku ssande nga bali kawerette.
Ayongeddeko nti mu tiimu ye yonna temuli muntu ali waggulu wa myaka asatu era nti akimanyi bulungi nti tebayinza butawangula kyapa kuba bonna bamusaayi muto.
Tumaze emyazi nga tutendekebwa obukodyo obw'enjawulo okwo gattako okulya obulungi ng'ate tetukozesa bintu byonna bitamiiza era sisuubirayo muntu ayinza kumegga baana bange kuba obukodyo bwonna nabubamaliddeyo bwatyo SSebalemba bwategezeza.
Wabula kyensaba banna Butambala kwekujjumbira okugenda e Mpigi ku kisaawe batuwagire abamegganyi baffe basobole okuddamu amaanyi agamegga amasaza gonna getugenda okuttunka nago.
Empaka z’ekigwo ggumbya zigenda kubeera mu kisaawe e Mpigi ku sande eno nga 21 era nga zakwetabwamu amasaza ataano okuli essaza lya Mawokota,Butambala,Gomba,Ssese ne Kyadondo era anaaziwangula wakutwala ekyapa n'ebirabo ebirala bingi.

NAKIFUMA
Kyadaaki eddwaliro lya Kikube Health Centre II eritalina kaabuyonjo ku kyalo Kakuukuulu mu ggombolola y’e Kasawo lifunye alijuna.
Omubaka wa Nakifuma, Fred Ssimbwa Kaggwa y’alitaddemu ssente okulidabiliza. Lino lisangiddwa nga terilina kaabuyonjo, litonya, edagala temuli nga n’ebitanda mulimu bibiri(2) byokka. Kyategerekese nti abasawo n’abalwadde okwetewuluza badukira ku ssomero eririnaanyewo.
Ng’ali ne Hanifa Nabukeera omubaka omukya owa Mukono disitulikiti, Ssimbwa yategeezezza abatuuze nga bwagenda okulidabiliza era wa kulibakwasa ku lunaku lwa Bamaama, May 8. Mathias Mpuuga akulira oludda oluvuganya mu paliyamenti yagenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu.

Omusumba wa Life Christian Church Jackson Ssenyonga akungubagidde omugenzi Paasita Augustine Yiga eyavude mu bulamu bw'ensi eno olunaku olwaleero kyokka n'asaba abantu bulijjo okulekanga omukululo omulungi .
Wabula Ssenyonga talina kalungi k'ayogedde ku mugenzi n'agamba nti afudde talokose yadde nga ku ssaawa esembayo agezezzaako nnyo okumutuukirira alokoke kyokka ne birema .
Ayogedde ku mugenzi nga abadde nabbi ow'obulimba , omukabassanyi w'abakazi era nga waafiiridde abadde awerebye endiga ze nnyingi ekirwadde kya kiryatabaala nga kw'otadde n'okwegaana abaana baazadde mw'abo baakaka omukwano.
Ssenyonga akoowode abo bonna omugenzi be yazaalamu kyokka n'agaana okubalabirira okuggya gy'ali abawe obuyambi wamu n'okuweerera abaana baabwe.
Ssenyonga agabidde abaamawulire obutambi bwa CD obwoleka ebikolobero omugenzi by'azze akola.
Bya Jaliat Namuwaya

Ebitongole ebikessi mu mawana ga Africa bikkaanyizza okugabana nókukozesa obukugu obwawamu okulwanyisa abatujju nábayekera ba Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) abasinziira mu Democratic Republic of Congo, okukola obulumbaganyi mu mawanga ga Africa agenjawulo..
Mu nsisinkano yábakulira ebitongole ebikessi mu Africa olutudde mu Uganda ku kitebe kya Chief of Military Intelligence e Mbuya bakaanyizza nti singa amawanga gano tegakolera wamu, abatujju baakwongera okufuuka ekyonga nókutirimbula bannansi m
... 
 ekibinja kye kitongole ekikessi okuva e South Africa ategezezza nti amawanga gabwe galina okusalawo ekyenkomeredde ku kulwanyisa obutujju buno obutongera kusaasaana.
Omuduumizi we kitongole ekikessi mu Uganda Major General James Birungi mu bubaka bwatisse omuduumizi we kitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju ekya National Counter Terrorism Centre, Brigadier General Dominic Twesigomwe agambye nti amawanga gano galina okusooka okukwatagana mu ngeri gakkirizaamu abantu okusala ensalo za mawanga gano awatal
...
ujju aba ADF ng’eyambibwako magye ga DRC gokka.
Abatujju ba ADF kigambibwa nti bazze benyigira mu bulumbaganyi obw’enjawulo nga batega bbomu ezifiiriddemu abantu.
Ezaakasembayo zaayo ku Parliamentary Avenue okumpi ne Jubilee house ne ku CPS mu Kampala mu mwaka gwa 2022 abantu abasoba mu 7 nebattibwa.
Mu nnaku ntono eziyise ebitongole by’olwerinda biriko bbomu 6 zebyaateguludde mu bitundu bya Kampala ebyenjawulo, nga kigambibwa nti zaabadde zitegeddwa batujju ba ADF.
Bisakiddwa: Ssebuliba William

Makerere University wamu ne Universities endala zisabiddwa okwetaba obutereevu mu kulwanirira n’okulambika ku nsonga z’ eddembe ly’obuntu mu ggwanga okusinga okuzirekera bannabyabufuzi n’ebitongole byanakyeewa
Bino bibadde mu kutongoza alipoota eyokuna ey’akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu mu Wakiso district eya 2023, ku mukolo ogubadde ku Makerere University School of Vetenary Medicine.
Alipoota y’omulundi guno ebadde ku mulamwa ogw’okwongera amaanyi mu ddembe ly’bulamu , obuweereza mu bantu wamu n’e
... 
ubeera mu bizibu ebitaggwa gemattendekero nga Makerere University okutandika okwesamba ensonga ezikwata kubulamu bwantu .
Principal wa Makerere school of Vetenary Medicine prof Mwiine Frank ategeezezza kati bwebagenda okufuba okulaba nga ssetendekero wa Makerere yenyigira butereevu kukulambika ku nsonga ezinyigiriza omuntu wabulijjo, naddala okulwanirira obutonde bwensi nga wano bakutuukira ddala kubuli muntu avunanyizibwa.
Bonabye Kamaadi director avunanyizibwa ku nsonga z’okunonyereza mu kiton
...
 ez’ebitundu okulaba nga district zonna zitekesa mu nkola obukiiko obuvunayizibwa ku ddembe ly’obuntu nga district ye Wakiso bwekola.
Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu mu Wakiso Elly Kasirye agamba nti alipoota y’omulundi guno essira balitadde nnyo kubyobulamu kubanga bakizudde nti amalwaliro agasinga gali mu mbeera mb.
Agambye nti waliwo nagamu ku malwaliro gebasanze nga gaazimbibwa nga tegaliko bifo byanguyizaako abantu abaliko obulemu okufuna obuweereza obulungi.
Bisakiddwa: Tonny Ngabo

Robert Kyagulanyi Sentamu (Bobi Wine) yalaalise nga bw'atagenda kukkiriza bya butakuba nkuhhaana kubanga akakiiko k'ebyokulonda bwe kaabadde kabisalawo keebuuzizza ku muntu omu Pulezidenti Museveni ate nga naye asuubirwa okuvuganya ku kifo kye kimu ekya Pulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021.
Yagambye nti okukuba enkuhhaana mu kunoonya akalulu k'Obwapulezidenti kiri mu mateeka era bw'anaaba azikubye ajja kuba atambulidde mu Ssemateeka ky'alagira.
Bino Bobi Wine yabyogedde eggulo mu lukuhhaana lwa bannama
... 
 bwa Corona okwanjula entegeka eyamba ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza wabula bino abakulembeze ba NRM baabisambazze ne bategeeza nti okukulembeza akalulu n'oleka obulamu bw'abantu mu katyabaga, tebuba bukulembeze bulungi.
Wiiki ewedde Minisita w'ebyamawulire, Judith Nabakooba yalabudde abantu obuteetaba mu kampeyini ya kukuba buseppiki eyalangirirwa Bobi Wine ne Dr. Kizza Besigye ng'agamba nti obulwadde bwa Corona busobola okubakwata nga beekalakaasa.
Bobi Wine mu kwogera yagambye nti: Amerika yaakafi
...
, Jotham Taremwa yagambye nti bye baalangirira byonna biri mu mateeka agabawa obuyinza okutegeka okulonda mu mbeera ekusobozesa okubeerawo ne kuggwa mirembe n'agamba nti ofiisi zaabwe nzigule okuwuliriza ebirowoozo by'abategeka okuvuganya n'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirala; n'agattako nti atakkaanya n'ekyo asobola okukozesa ekkubo lya kkooti.
Bobi Wine yakkaatirizza nga bw'agenda okwesimbawo avuganye Pulezidenti Museveni mu kulonda okujja n'agamba nti nga People Power tebagenda kuzira kalulu kano.

Olwali olwo omukazi munnabyabufuzi Miria Matembe n’ateesa mu Palamenti ng’agamba nti abasajja abakwata abakazi okunyumya akaboozi olw’empaka, balaayibwenga bulaayibwa olw’okubamala emmya.
Babaka banne bamwanukula mangu nti eky’okulaawa abasajja si kituufu kubanga kirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe ery’obuntu.
Naye ate kati kirabika ng’ekiseera kituuse okusalawo kiki ekiyinza okukolebwa abasajja abeeyambisa obubi eddembe ly’obuntu ne bafutyanka eddembe ly’abalala.
Gamba nga musajjamukulu Matovu ow’e Kalagala mu disitulikiti y’e Luweero aweza emyaka 65 egy’obukulu, eyakoze ebikolobero ku kawala ke k’azaalira ddala ak’emyaka 13 n’akakwata n’akakavvula.
Akaana kano ab’ekyalo baakasanze mu kifulukwa nga gye keekwese, era nga kagamba nti kadduka mu maka ga kitaawe waako kubanga taata waako abadde akeefuukira n’akakwata n’akabonyaabonya.
Taata ono bwe yakwatiddwa yakikkiriza bulambalamba nti abadde akwata akaana ke ako n’akakavvula.
Yagambye nti kyokka akaana ke kaamuyisa obubi, kubanga olumu kaayambala akateteeyi akampi ne katuula mu ntebe ye ne kamusaaliza era kwe kukakwata!
Mu ngeri eyo eby’ekivve ng’ebyo Bamatovu bakaggwensonyi bye bakola ne ku baana baabwe amabujje be bazaala, tekyebeereka nakatono okuddamu okulowooza ku kiteeso kya Miria Matembe eky’okulaawa abagwagwa abo.
Bwe balaayibwa balaayibwe ggwe kale balina kukolerwa ki? Kubanga mazima yo ensi egudde eddalu ate egwiridde ddala addalu ekkankada. Sikulimba.

Amawulire
Ab’e West Nile bajjukizza omukulembeze w’eggwanga ku bisuubizo
Bya Mike Sebalu. Ababaka ba Parliament okuva mu bitundu bya West Nile baagala gavumenti okwaguyako okuyunga ekitundu kyabwe ku masanyalaze g’eggwanga, abantu bebakulembera basobole okwenyigira mu milimu egivaamu ensimbi n’okugatta ettofaali ku nkulakulana y’eggwanga.
Bano era baagala n’ebisuubizo ebyeyamibwa gavumenti mu kalulu k’omwaka gwa 1996 bituukirizibwe.
Okwogera bino, babadde mu ketegekelero kakwaniriza mukulembeze 
... 
bakaka abava mu kitundu kino ogwa West Nile Parliamentary Caucus era nga ye mubaka wa Ora County mu Parliament Biyika Lawrence Songa agamba nti mu bisuubizo ebyalema okutuukirizibwa mwemuli n’amakubo.
Omukulembeze w’eggwanga okulambula kwe agenda kutandikira mu kibuga Arua era nga ajja kutuukako ne mu bitundu by’e Obongi gy’asuubirwa okworezeganya n’abantu baayo mu bitundu ebye Madi.
Wabula obugenyi bw’omukulembeze w’eggwanga bwajidde ku lunaku lwelumu ng’emyaka leero ku lw’okubiri giweze 44 buk
...
ga kigenderere.
Wabula akulira eby’amawulire mu kibiina ekiri mu bukulembeze Emmanuel Dombo agamba nti ennaku zakwataganye bukwataganyi naye nga tekyaali kigenderere.
Abayeekera ba Uganda nga bayambibwako eggye ky’eggwanga lya Tanzania, bawamba ekibuga Kampala nga 11/04/1979 era bwebatyo nebamaamulako President Amin eyaliko mu kiseera ekyo.
Oluvanyuma lw’okuwamba, Amin yawangangukira mu gwanga lya Libya ate eyo gyeyava neyeyongerayo e Iraq er oluvanyuma nafiira e Saudi Arabia mu mwaka ogwa 2003.

President Yoweri Kaguta Tibuhaburwa Museveni era alagidde abantu bonna abeesenza mu ntobazi baazamuke bunnambiro, ngómukono ogwécuuma tegunavaayo.
Agambye nti bano bebavuddeko enkyukakyuka y’embeera yobudde evuddeko ekyeya mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo, ekiremeseza abantu okulima emmere emala.
President Museveni abadde mu kisaawe e Kololo ku mukolo gwókusoma embalirira yéggwanga, eya trillion 48 nóbuwumbi 130.
Museveni agambye nti okugyako abantu be Busoga bagambye nti entobazi baazisengamu
... 
eemu.
Agambye nti abantu abalala abeesenza mu ntobazi mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo nga naabo abeesenza mu ntobazi eziri mu Kampala nemiriraano bazaamuke bunnambiro, bwekirema bakusindiiikirizibwa
Museveni agambye nti ebyekisa biweddewo.
Museveni alu𝝶amizza nti tewali kizibu eggwanga lino lyekitasobola kwa𝝶anga singa libeera n’emmere emala, nólwekyo tebayinza kukwasa kisa bantu besenza mu ntobazi kwonoona buttonde bwansi.
Agambye nti emmere erina okuliisa bannansi n’okutunda mu mawanga amal
...
u makulu, nebeeerabira nti ekizibu ekisinga obunene lyebbula lyémmere
Mu ngeri yeemu President alangiridde nti wakuwolereza n’amaanyi ge gonna, minister wa science ne tekinologiya Dr Monica Musenero, olwábantu abamulumiriza nti mulyake.
Dr. Monica Musenero ennaku eziyise, abadde ku bunkenke olwa alipoota eyamukolebwako mu parliament eyalaga nti ensimbi zeyafunanga okunoonyereza nókuvumbula eddagala lya Covid19, nti yazibulankanya.
Museveni alabudde nti abo abawalampa Dr Musenero, banuune ku vvu.

Ennongoosereza zino zikirambika nti kigenda kubeera kya buwaze omukozesa yenna okusasulira omukozi we ssente z'alina okutereka bw'alemwa ekibonerezo bakyongedde okukikalubya.
Etteeka eririwo kirambika nti omukozi aggyibwako ebitundu 5 ku 100 ku musaala gwe olwo omukozesa n'amwongerezaako ebitundu 10 ku 100 n'azimuterekera mu NSSF.
Kyokka ssente ezo zibadde ziggyibwako omusolo naye mu nnongoosereza ereeteddwa tebaggya kuziggyako musolo.
Akulira NSSF, Richard Byarugaba ng'ali n'omukungu wa Gavunen
... 
ekitongole ku ssente z'abakozi kyokka ennongoosereza zikkiriza Gavumenti okuzeewola ng'egoberera amateeka.
Ebitundu 10 ku 100 omukozesa z'aterekerayo omukozi zibadde teziggyibwako musolo naye mu nnongoosereza tekirambuluddwa oba zinaggyibwako era wano Byarugaba yategeezezza nti baakugenda mu Palamenti bakittaanye.
Ennongoosereza zirambika nti, omuntu alina ssente mu NSSF asobola okuziggyayo ku myaka 55 kyokka ku myaka gino amagoba ge zikoze gaggyibwako omusolo naye singa agumiikiriza n'aziggyayo
...
nongoosereza ezikolebwa ajja kubeeranga wa ddembe okusalawo okweterekerayo ssente endala mu ngeri ya kyeyagalire.
Wano Byarugaba weyasinzidde n'ategeeza nti okunoonyereza kulaga nti Bannayuganda ebitundu 93 ku 100 batuuka okuwummula nga tebawezaayo bukadde 50 mu NSSF newankubadde ng'abasinga abeera aterese okumala emyaka 25 .
Kkyokka akasente ke bafuna okuva mu NSSF bakakozesa mu bbanga lya mwaka gumu nga tebakyalinawo wadde omunwe gw'ennusu ate nga tebalina kintu kye bazikozeemu ekizza amagoba.

Abakukusa ebiragalalagala n’ababiguza abaana b’amassomero baakusibwa mayisa mu nkomyo, okusinziira ku bibonerezo ebiteereddwa mu bbago ly’etteeka eryanjuddwa mu parliament okulwanyisa ebiragalalagala erya Narcotics drugs and psychotropic substance control bill.
Etteeka lino wiiki 2 eziyise ,kkooti yalisazaamu bweyakizuula nti parliament bweyali eriyisa mu mwaka 2016, teyalina muwendo gwassalira ogw’ababaka
Ababaka 2 Asuman Basaalirwa owa Bugiri municipality ne Christopher Komakech owa Aruu bebaabadde bawomye omutwe mu kuddamu okwanjula etteeka lino.
Christopher Komakech agambye nti abaana bangi boononese olw’ebiragalalagala.
Wabula ssaabawolereza wa government Kiryowa Kiwanuka ategezezza sipiika wa parliament nti government eddizibwe obuvunaanyizibwa obuddamu okwekennenya n’okubaga etteeka eryo, oluvannyuma eryanjule mu parliament.
Sipiika Anitah Annet Among yakkiriza era n’abalagira obutasukka Thursday ya wiiki eno, okuba nga government ezzeemu okwanjula etteeka lino erikwata kukulwanyisa ebiragalalagala.#

Omuntu omu atanategeerekeka mannya eyakedde okusaabalila ku mmeeri eya MV Kalangala ebadde eva e Kalangala okudda e Entebbe yesudde mu mazzi naaffa.
Omuvubuka ono ateberezebwa okutemera mu myaka egy’obukulu 30 yasoose kutegeeza basabazze banne nga bwatabadde na nsimbi zakusasula mmeeri ebadde edda Entebbe, wabula babadde banaatera okutuuka neyesuula mu nnyanja.
Omugoba w’emmeeri Cornely Mujahuzi Agamba nti bagezezaako okumutaasa wabula tekisobose.
Mujahuzi agambye nti bategezezza Police ye Nakiwogo neggulawo file era baleseeyo essimu n’akasawo byalese ku mmeeri.
Guno gwe mulundi ogwokubili omusabazze okubuuka ku mmeeri ya MV Kalangala neyesuula mu nnyanja, ng’eyasooka yasuulamu mu mwaka gwa 2021 era yaleka ategeeza basaabazze banne nti yali akoonye ensi.
Bisakiddwa: David Ssekayinga

OMUZIBIZI wa KCCA FC ne Cranes Joseph Ochaya yavudde ku wooteeri ya Serena nga teyeetegera olw’essanyu oluvannyuma lw’okulondebwa ng’omuzannyi eyasinga banne mu liigi y’eggwanga eya Azam Uganda Premier League bw'atyo ne yeewangulira kapyata ya Subaru Forester.
Ochaya eyayamba ttiimu ye okuwangula liigi yamezze Robert Sentongo eyali owa URA FC eyasinga abateebi ne ggoolo 18 saako ne Erisa Sekisambu owa Vipers SC eyamudirira ne ggoolo 16.
Ochaya yadde muzibizi yateeba ggoolo 7 era yasibagana ne Mu
... 
rs SC ekikopo.
Ebisumuluzo bya mmotoka Ochaya byamukwasiddwa Maj. Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba, eyabadde omugenyi omukulu kwe baasimidde n’abazannyi abalala bangi wamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo mu biti eby’enjawulo omwabadde omutendesi eyasinga ne bannamawulire abaasinga okusasaanya amawulire ku liigi.
Abalala abawangudde;
Mike Mutebi owa KCCA FC- mutendesi eyasinga, Keneth Magada – Mutendesi wa bakwasi ba ggoolo, Miiro Brian Nsubuga – ddiifiiri eyasinga, Vipers SC – ttiimu eyasinga empisa, Ali Kafeero ow
...
singa, Simeone Masaba owa URA – omuzannyi asinze okulwa mu ttiimu, Martin Kizza owa SC Villa – omuzannyi eyasinga okusanyusa ku ttivvi, Robert Ssentongo eyali owa URA ye yasinga abateebi ne ggoolo 18, Mathias Muwanga owa Sadolin ye mukwasi wa ggoolo owa sizoni, Musa Walangalira owa JMC- omuzinizi eyasinga, Mutyaba Muzamiru owa KCCA FC – omuwuwutannyi eyasinga bane, Musa Esenu owa Vipers ye muzannyi abawagizi gwe baalonze ng’owa sizoni.
Omukolo gwabaddeyo ekiro ky’olwokutaano nga August 12, 2016.

Amawulire
Abébyókwerinda e Moroto bataddewo amateeka amakakali ku basuubuzi b’ente mu kitundu ekyo
Juliet Nalwooga. Poliisi mu bendo bendo lyé Moroto ekendeezezza ku bungi bwámakubo agabadde gayitwamu abo abasuubula ente mu kitundu ekyo nékigendererwa ekyókukendeeza obubbi bwebisolo.
Kino kyakwanguyiriza abakuuma dembe okwekebejja buli motoka ettisse ebisolo efuluma ekitundu ekyo.
Mike Longole nga yayogerera poliisi mu bitundu byé Moroto, agamba nti wabaddewo enkola yóbunyazi bwénte okuva mu butale obwénjawulo oluvanyuma ezitikkibwa ku motoka nezifulumizibwa mu butale obuli wabweru wa Karamoja.
Kati motoka zonna ezettise ente nga ziva mu district okuli ey’e Amudat, Nakapiripirit, ne Nabilatuk zirina kuyitira ku luguudo oluva e Nakapiripirit – Moroto.
Ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku bisolo ebyo byakwekebejjerwa ku kifo ekimanyiddwa nga Nadunget oluvanyuma mtoka zilyoke zegatte ku luguudo oluva e Moroto- Soroti olwo zifulume.
Motoka zonna ezitambuza ebisolo nga ziva Kaabong ne Kotido kijja zikakatako okukozesa oluguudo oluva e Kaabong – Kotido -Moroto.
Abali mu mulimu gwóbusuubuzi bwénte bawereddwa amagezi okugoberera endagiliro esaliddwawo okwewala okutataganyizibwa.

Cecilia Barbara Atim Ogwal afudde enkya ya leero.
Ogwal afiiridde ku myaka 77.
Amawulire agava mu famire galaga nti Ogwal afiiridde mu ggwanga lya India ng’abadde atawanyizibwa obulwadde bwa Kkansa.
Cecilia Ogwal yazaalibwa mu disitulikiti y’e Dokolo nga 12, June, 1946.
Yasomera mu Uganda wabula ku myaka 21, yafuna omukisa okugenda mu University of East Africa mu Nairobi (kati emanyikiddwa nga University of Nairobi) okusoma diguli mu by’obusuubuzi.
Yasomerako mu nsi endala omuli Singapore ne Australia ebintu eby’enjawulo.
Ebyobufuzi abiruddemu
- Yakolako ng’omuwandiisi w’ekibiina ki Uganda People’s Congress (UPC) okuva 1985 – 1992
- Mu 1994, yali kakiiko akabaga sseemateeka wa Uganda owa 1995.
- Yali mu bifo ebyamaanyi mu UPC okutuusa mu 2004.
- Mu kulonda kwa 2006, mutabani w’omugenzi Milton Obote, Jimmy Akena, yamuwangula ku ky’omubaka wa Monisipaali y’e Lira.
- Mu 2011, Ogwal yaddamu okuvuganya era yawangula eky’omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Dokolo.
- Okuwangula, yava mu UPC okudda mu Forum for Democratic Change (FDC).
- Ogwal abadde mukyala mufumbo n’abaana 7.
- Wabula mu 1969, ku myaka 23, yawangula obwa Miss Uganda.
- Mu Palamenti, abadde kakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku by’okuzimba n’okutekateeka Bajeti y’eggwanga.
- Ebirala ebifa mu ggwanga – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P8wz-GCTqbw

Abantu 5 bafiiridde mu kabenje ka mmotoka ekagudde Kiwawu ku luguudo oluva e Kampala okudda e Mityana, ng’obudde busaasaana nga 17 August,2024.
Babadde batambulira mu mmotoka Ipsum No.UAS 999R ebadde eva ku kudda olwe Kampala.
Omugoba wa Ipsum avudde ku mukono gwe ng’agezaako okusala ekinnya ekiri mu Luguudo, gyayambalaganidde ne Fuso Boxbody no.UBM511K ebadde eva e Mityana.
Abafudde bonna basajja nga kutegeerekeseeko Ssempala Fredrick, Kigozi Francis ne Sserubombwe Albert nga bonna batuuze be Ssumbwe Bulenga mu Wakiso.
Kigambibwa nti abafudde bonna babadde baluganda nga babadde bagenda waabwe mu bitundu bye Mubende.
Bisakiddwa: James Kaana Ssebuguzi

OMUBAKA wa Gavumenti e Lwengo, Grace Kabayo agobye abadde akulira poliisi y’e Kyazanga, William Mukirane ng’agamba nti avudde ku mulamwa n’adda ku kulya enguzi n’okubulankanya ebizibiti.
Mukirane yafulumiziddwa ofiisi wakati mu kusaakaanya okuva mu batuuze n’abamu ku baserikale RDC yasoose kutuuza lukiiko lwa byakwerinda olwa Disitulikiti oluvannyuma n’atuuza olw’abaserikale ba poliisi olwa bannamawulire nga mu luno mw
... 
Kyazanga.
Kabayo yagambye nti talina buyinza buggya muntu mu poliisi naye ono ye amugobye mu Disitulikiti ye ng’akulira ebyokwerinda. Agamba nti ebintu bingi omuli; okubulankanya ebintu by’abo ababa bagudde ku bubenje n’awa eky’okulabirako eky’ekimotoka lya bbiya ekyagwa ku Prison nga kigambibwa nti Mukirane mu kifo ky’okulagira bakuume omwenge guno ye yasalawo naye kwenyigira mu kugutunda, ekirala y’emmotoka eyagwa e Katovu eyali etisse butto nayo kigambibwa okuba nga yeenyigira mu kumunyaga bu
...
a nti abadde takyafa kw’ani asinga musango wabula oyo alina ssente era oyo y’alina okusinga omusango.
Wabula Mukirane yagambye nti RDC talina buyinza kumugoba era n’ategeeza nga bw’atamanyi byonna bimwogerwako ng’agamba nti byonna bya kumusibako matu ga mbuzi kumuliisa ngo kubanga talina ky’amanyi .
Okusinziira ku mwogezi wa poliisi mu bukiikaddyo bwa Uganda, Nuwa Sserunjogi agambye nti poliisi y’e Kyazanga kati ekulirwa abadde akulira bambega, Edward Mulera nga bwe banoonya anaasikira Mukirane.

... 
anga kino kizibu kya maanyi mu Banda nga bakaayanira ensalo wakati waabwe ne munisipaali y'e Kira.
Ate Simon Barigo kkansala owa Naggulu I yagambye nti kituufu zooni ezimu mu Nakawa nnene nnyo nga zeetaaga kusalibwamu kyokka tebalina kupapa balina kusooka kuteesa bateekeewo amakubo mwe balina okuyita okusalamu zooni ezo.
Town Clerk wa Nakawa, Denis Omodi yawabudde bakkansala bano n'agamba nti ensonga teri Nakawa yokka wabula n'ebitundu ebirala bwe batyo beetaaga okwebuuza ku bakungu abalala omul
...
afiirizza omusolo muyitirivu n'asaba Gavumenti okufuba okulaba ng'ensalo za Nakawa zerurwa mu bwangu.

Bya Tonny Evans Ngabo
Ebitongole by’obwannakyewa (NGO) ebikakkalabiza emirimu mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso birabuddwa okwewala okukozesa mu nkukutu ekituusa n’okuteeka eby’okwerinda by’eggwanga ku bunkenke.
Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa akulira abakozi BA gavumenti mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso Alfred Malinga bw’abadde asisinkanyebab’ebitongole by’obwannakyewa eby’enjawulo ebikolera mu Wakiso ku ttabamiruka waabwe afundikira omwaka.
Malinga agambye nti oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti okuteeka omukono ogw’ekyum
... 
 okukolera mu nkukutu nga kino agambye nti kimenya mateeka.
Ono asabye bannakyewa bano okugoberera amateeka okusinga okwekweka nga bakola emirimu mu nkukuttu nti yenna gwe banaakwatako kaakumujjuutuka.
Ye ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Wakiso Dr. Matia Lwanga Bwanika ategeezezza ng’ebitongole by’obannakyewa bwe biyambye disitulikiti mu nsonga nnyingi omuli okutumbula eby’obulamu mu by’enjigiriza era n’abisaba okwekolamu omulimu bakwatte ku nsonga ez’enjawulo okusinga ate okubeera mu buwereza obufa
...
ubi nga tebikoleddwako wadde. Nga miyita mu kibiina kino mwe mwegattira, mutuulenga mukkaanye ku buweereza bwe mulina okuwa abantu n’ebitundu mwe mulina okukolera. Musobole okukwata ku nsonga ez’enjawulo,” ssentebe bwe yategeezezza.
Bannakyewa nga bakulembeddwa ssentebe w’omukago gwabwe ogwa Wakiso District NGO Forum Ofwono Leonard bagamba nti waliwo n’ebitongole ebikunukkiriza mu 3000 bikolera mu disitulikiti eno naye nga bakyaganye okuvaayo babeegatteko okusobola okusitula eddoboozi erya wamu.

SC Villa 2; 1 Saints
Kirinya Jinja SSS 1; 1KCCA
Lweza FC 1; 1 Sadoline
Bright Stars 2;1 BIDCO
Abawagizi ba SC Villa omupiira gwabwe bagulabye beemulugunyiza ebaddukanya ekisaawe kya Namboole obutaggyawo byuma ebyabaddeko konsati y’eddiini wiiki ewedde bakira bye bagambya nti byabadde bibaziyiza okulaba abasambi baabwe nga bacaanga akapiira okumegga Saints FC ggoolo 2-1.
Obutasaawa muddo nakyo awamu n’obutafukirira kisaawe mazzi ng’ebitundu ebimu byabadde omuddo gukaze bye bimu ku byayombezza abawagizi.
Alex Kitatta ye yasoose okuteeba abaabadde bakamaabe sizoni ewedde aba The Saints ne kuddako Godfrey Lwesibawa ate aya Saints n’eteebwa George Senkaaba. Kuludda olulala, KCCA FC yeesammudde ebibadde bigambibwa nti abawagizi baayo baaleese akasambattuko mu kisaawe e Bugembe bwe baabadde balemaganwa ne Kirinya Jinja SSS ggoolo 1-1.
Akulira eby’enkwanaganya mu KCCA FC, Clive Kyazze agambye nti abawa gizi ba Kirinya Jinja SSS be baayingidde ekisaawe okukyunya ddiifiri nga bagamba nti yalamudde bubi omupiira. “Abawagizi baffe baayingidde ekisaawe okutaasa abasambi so si kulwana.
Tutegeeza abawagizi baffe wamu n’abatuteekamu ensimbi nti tetukkiriza ffujjo mu bawagizi,” bw’ategeezezza mu kiwandiiko ky’afulumizza enkya ya leero. Emipiira gya liigi ya Azam Premier League giddamu ku Lwokutaano.

District kadhi wa Kayunga Bugerere Dr. Hafiz Muhammad Haruna Bukenya asabye abafumbo bulijjo okugumikiriza,okutya Allah wamu nokubeera n’amazima obufumbo busobole okubatambulira obulungi.
Hafiz Bukenya okwogera bino asinzidde kumukolo gw’okufumbiza Salimah Bint Hussein muwala wa Hussein Baligeya nga ono awoweddwa nemwana munne Hydary Muganzi Buyondo awangaalira e Bungereza nga mutaabani wa Hajji Muhammad Muganzi Buyondo. Bano bagatiddwa mumaka ga Dr. Hafiz Bukenya e Kawuku Bukasa kuluguudo lw’enttebe.
Hafiz Bukenya anyonyodde nti ebbanga abafumbo lyebamala nga tebakulembeza Allah wabwe munsonga zabwe babeera mukufafaganirwa. Sheik Bukenya ono asibilidde entanda omugole Salimah nga ono muwala wamwanyina entanda okubeera omuwulize eri bba wamu nokuwangana ekitiibwa.
Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abebitiibwa bangi Omuli eyaliko district kadhi we Kayunga eyawummula Sheik Haruna Matovu nga ono ye asabye abazadde okukuza abaana n’empisa wamu nokubagazisa ediini yabwe.
Ate ye Omukulu w’ettwale lya Makindye sabagabo era ssabawandiisi w’ekitongole ky’ebigezo by’ediini ekya Islamic Primary Leaving examinations Board Sheik Ismail Kazibwe Kitiibwa asiimye nnyo abafumbiriganiddwa bano olwokukola ng’amateeka g’obusiramu bwegalagira navumirira abo bonna abenyigira mubikolwa by’omukwano ogw’ebikukujju nagamba nti tekirizibwa mubusiramu era byebimu kubiretedde embeera y’ebyenfuna okwononeka.
Bya Tenywa Ismail.

Uganda esuubira okutandika okusima amafuta gaayo mu 2021 kyokka waliwo okutya nti Bannayuganda bayinza obutaganyulwa nnyo olw’obutaba na bukugu mu by’amafuta.
Wano gavumenti wesinzidde okulagira amakkampuni agaawereddwa omulimu gw’okutandika okusima amafuta gatandike okutendeka Bannayuganda abagwiira baleme kubamalako mirimu.
Omwaka 2020 we gunaatuukira amakampuni agali mu by’okusima, okulongoosa n’okutunda amafuta gagenda kukakibwa okuitandika okukozesa Bannayuganda.
Omwogezi wa gavumenti Ofwon
... 
udde e Ntebe nga lukubirizibwa Pulezidenti Museveni.
Olukiiko lwayisizza enkola egenda okugoberera mu by’okusima amafuta ng’egenderera okulaba nga Bannayuganda tebalekebwa bbali mu nsonga zino.
Ofwono yategeezezza nti kizuuliddwa nti abaganyulwa mu mirimu egimu bagwiira. N’agamba nti amakkampuni g’abagwiira agamu gajja n’abakozi baago be bawa ensimbi z’emisaala n’ensako ennyingi kwe bagatta n’okuleeta ebikozesebwa okuva mu mawanga gaabwe.
Yagambye nti mu nkola eyayisiddwa gavumenti kino kigenda 
...
osa amafuta gagenda kukakibwa okutandika okukozesa Bannayuganda.
Uganda bw’eneeba etandise okulongoosa amafuta, esuubira okutandikira ku kufulumya amafuta ga galoni emitwalo esatu buli lunaku. Kyokka ng’ebipipa ebirala ebyemafuta agatali malongoose ebiwera emitwalo esatu buli lunaku bigenda kutundibwanga bweru.
Eddongoserezo ly’amafuta bwe linaggwa obulungi olwo Uganda tegenda kuddamu kutunda mafuta gatali malongoose gonna bweru, ejja kuba efulumya amafuta amalongoose ga bipipa emitwalo mukaaga.

KANGAAWO
Kangaawo ye Wessaza afuga Essaza Bulemeezi.Okuva ku mulembe gwa Ssekabaka Kimera(1275-1330), okutuuka ku mulembe gwa
Ssekabaka Mawanda (1740-1760), ekitundu kya Buganda ekyayitibwanga Bulemezeezi, kyafugibwanga mu nsikirano.Omutaka
Nnaabugwamu yabuweebwa Ssekabaka kimera (1275-1330) ng'amazze okulya Obuganda.Okuva ku Kimera okutuka ku Mawanda,
Bulemeezi teryali ssaza.Nnaabugwamu yali Ssabawaali ku Kaggo.Essaza lye tuyita Bulemeezi kaakano,Nnaabugwamu yalifugangako
kapapajjo.Ekitundu ekisinga obunene Nnabugugwamu kye yafuganga kaakati kiri mu Kyaddondo.Ebyalo nga Wamirongo,Buwambo,Kkungu
ne Kasalirwe byali mu Bulemeezi nga bifugibwa Nnaabugwamu
Kangaawo oluusi ayitibwa Ssaabalemeezi.
Ennyumba ya kangaawo eyitibwa kasusse-omumiro
Enngoma ye evuga nti: "Fekka Abalemeezi, Fekka Abalemeezi".
Omugenzi Yozefu Nsingisira ye yaggya embuga ya Kangaawo ku Buzinde n'agizza Ku Waluleeta.Ate Omwami Mukasa samwili
ye yaggya embuga ya kangaawo ku Waluleeta n'agizza ku kasozi Ggaga kw'eri kaakano.Naye olwo'butasuula mannya Bbowa ne
Buzinde, embuga ya Kangaawo gye yasookera akasozi Ggaga baakaggyako erinya lyako ne bakayita Bbowa-Buzinde.

Obuwanguzi bwa Kasibante mu Lubaga North busaziddwamu

Omuyimbi munna Kibiina kya NUP Hillary Kiyaga ‘Dr. Hilderman’ asunsuddwa okuvuganya ku ky’omubaka wa Palamenti e Mawokota North mu disitulikiti y’e Mpigi.
Dr. Hilderman agenda kutunka n’abantu ab’enjawulo omuli omuli munnakibiina kya NRM era Minisita w’ebyobusuubuzi Amelia Kyambadde ssaako ne Joseph Zimulamugwanya eyesimbyewo nga yindipendenti.
Olusunsuddwa, Dr. Hilderman agambye nti ebintu bingi ebisobye ng’abakadde bali mu bukulembeze era kekaseera emiti emito, okwata obuyinza okulongoosa ebisobye.
Mungeri y’emu agamba nti e Mawokota North ye muntu omutuufu okukola ku nsonga z’abantu omuli okunoonyeza abavubuka emirimu, okutumbula talenti n’okunga abantu okulonda Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ku bwa Pulezidenti bwa Uganda mu kulonda kwa 2021.
Wabula Minisita Kyambadde agambye nti singa addamu okulondebwa, okutumbula ebyenfuna maka, okulwanyisa ebbula ly’emirimu, okutambuza amasanyalaze ssaako n’amazzi, byagenda okutandikirako.
Eddoboozi lya Minisita Kyambadde

Nnaabagereka Sylvia Naginda atongozza ekisaakaate Gatonnya 2025, ekigenda okubumbujjira ku somero lya St.Janaan School Bombo Kalule.
Ekisaakaate kino kya mulundi gwa 18, era nga kigenda kutambulira ku mulamwa ogugamba nti “Okukwanaganya Obuwangwa bwaffe ne Tekinologiya”.
Nnaabagereka agambye nti basazeewo okulonda omulamwa guno, olw’aavubuka abakozesa obubi technologiya w’ebyempuliziganya okuvvoola abalala, so ng`ate basobola okumweyambisa okwekulakulanya n`okunyweza obuwangwa bwabwe.
Nnaabagere
... 
ya 2024, wamu ne Somero lya Janan School Bombo Kalule erigenda okutegeka eky`Omwaka ogujja 2025.
Minister webyenjigiriza, eby`obulamu era avunanyizibwa ku office ya Nnaabagereka Owek Cotlida Nakate Kikomeko, agambye nti ekisaakaate okuva lwekyatandikibwa kyafuuka empagi sseddugge mu kuteekateeka abaana b’eggwanga.
Ssenkulu wa MTN Uganda Sylvia Mulinge, agambye nti ekisaakaate Kya Nnaabagereka kigasse etoffaali ly’amaanyi mu nkuza ne nnambika y`omwana wa Uganda.
Ssenkulu wa Nnaabagereeka Developm
...
bwa ebintu byonna ebikolebwa mu Kisaakaate, wamu n’okutandika ku kaweefube w`okuzimba amaka gabwe amatongole age Kisaakaate e Masuuliita.
Omutandisi w’amasomero ga Janaan Schools Omukungu Micheal Kironde, agambye nti kino kitiibwa kyamanyi okuba nga bongeddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka ekisaakaate, baali baasemba okukitegeka mu 2017.
Agambye nti mu kisaakaate kino bagala okukwasizaako abamu ku baana abatalina busoboozi nga babasasuliira ensimbi z`okubatwala mu kisaakaate.
Bisakiddwa: Musisi John

Ekibuuzo
Lwaki Katonda yalonda Israeli okuba amabntu be abalonde?
Okuddamu
Mu kwogera ku nsi ya Israeli, Ekyamateeka 7:7-9 etugamba “Mukama teyabassaako kwagala kwe, so teyabalonda, kubanga mwasinga eggwanga lyonna obungi; kubanga mwali batono okusinga amawanga gonna:8 naye kubanga Mukama abaagala, era kubanga ayagala okukwata ekirayiro kye yalayirira bajjajja bammwe, Mukama kyeyava abaggyamu n'engalo ez'amaanyi, n'abanunula mu nnyumba y'obuddu, mu mukono gwa Falaawo kabaka w’e Misiri.Kale manya
... 
 Israeli okuba abantu Kristu mwanayita okusobola okuzaalibwa—okuba otulokole okutujja mu kibi n’okufa. (Yokaana 3:16). Katonda yasooka kusuubiza mulokozi nga Adamu ne Kaawa bamaze okw’onoona (Oluberyeberye 3). Katonda oluvanyuma yalaga nti omulokozi agenda kuva mu lunyiriri lwa Yiburayimu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo (Oluberyeberye 12:1-3). Yesu Kristu y’ensonga enkulu lwaki Katonda yalonda Israeli okuba abantu be abalonde. Katonda yali teyeetaga kuba na bantu balonde, wabula yasalawo okukikola bwatyo. Ye
...
 esomese ebikwata ku Katonda. Israeli lyali lirina kuba gwanga lya Bakabona, ba Nnabbi, era abaminsane eri ensi. Ekigendererwa kya Katonda kya Katonda kyali nti Israeli ebeere egwanga ely’enjawulo erisongera abalala eri Katonda n’ekisuubizo kye eky’omununuzi,era omulokozi. Ebiseera ebyasinga Israeli yalemererwa ekkatala lino. Wabula ekigendererwa kya Katonda— okuleeta omulokozi mu nsi—kyatuukirizibwa bulungi okuyita mu Yesu Kristu.
English
Lwaki Katonda yalonda Israeli okuba amabntu be abalonde?

Bya Katwere Musajjaakaawa
Weewaawo abantu bangi ddala batankana obuzaale bwabwe; era bangi abalina okusoowagana mu obuvunaanyizibwa, bwa Bajjajjaffe, n’abeebitiibwa. Wabula bulijjo tetusanye tunenye bantu nga bwetuzza embugo!
Kati nsaba munzikirize nziremu ebibuuzo ebyo, nga ntandikira ku kisooka
*1- Okulanya n’okuwera kye ki?*
Okulanya kitegeeza okweyanjula eri bajjajjaffe n’abaganda bonna. Ate okuwera kitegeeza okweyanjula mu maaso ga Nnamulondo.
Okulanya olina okulambulula 
... 
lira ku Mutala Kiwanyi mu Buddu; ndi muzzukulu wa Lwotoowone eyawummulira ku Mutala Butalaga – Bukomansimbi mu Buddu; ndi muzzukulu wa Kaggwa Ssonko, eyawummulira ku Mutala Butale mu Buddu.
(Lutaaya Wavamuno, Lwotoowone ne Kaggwa Ssonko, zonna ziba NJU ez’omusaayi gwo gumu ezisangibwa mu Nnyumba yeemu)

Lujja lwa Mwanamugimu obutaka buli Nateete mu Kyaddondo; mu Lunyiriri lw’abakondere obutaka buli Bulange mu Kyaddondo.
Nsibuka mu M
...
a muzzukulu wa Kasujja ow’Engeye.
Omuntu alanya nga agenda okusumika oba okusumikira omusika mu lumbe olw’omusajja oba omukazi.
Wabula bwetuba tuwera tetulina kulambulula buzaale bwaffe. Tugamba nti
“Ayi Kabaka nze musajjawo / omuzaanawo…, muzzukulu wa Muwanga Ssebyoto Kisolo… … …” n’omaliriza nti “ayi Kabaka wange woligwa wendigwa, engabo ya bajjajjange nginywezezza okulwanirira Obwakabaka bwange, Eggwanga lyange n’ensi yange Buganda.. Wangaala wangaala wangaala Kabaka wange, Kabaka wa Buganda”

Abavubi ba “Special” e Bwayiise mu Disizoni y’e Kawempe basannyalazza ebyentambula ku luguudo oluva e Kampala okudda e Gulu bwebatudde mu luguudo wakati nga bawakanya eky’abakwasisa amateeka mu KCCA nga bali wamu ne Police okubagaana okukolera mu kibangirizi kya UNRA ekiriraanye kkampuni y’emifaliso eya Turf form eri ku luguudo mwasanjala luno.
Abantu bano boogeddeko ne radio simba nga bagamba nti gyebuvuddeko baali bakolera okuliraana essundirio ly’amafuta erya Shell naye oluvannyuma lw’okukolawo oluguudo, bwebatyo nebakyusibwa Meeya wa Divizoni y’e Kawempe Emmanuel Sserunjogi Ow’eddembe n’abazza mu kibangirizi kya kya UNRA ekyo ekyogerwako eky’oluguudo.
Wabula kibabuuseeko enkya ya leero nga abakwasisa amateeka mu KCCA ne Police babagobaganya okwamuka ekifo kino ku biragiro bya Town Clerk, Wabula Meeya Sserunjogi ayanguye okutuuka mu kifo kino era n’abakakasa nga bwebagenda okugira nga basigala mu kifo kino nga bw’abanoonyeza ekifo eky’enkalakkalira mwebanaakakkalabiza emirimu gyabwe .

Ggwe omuvubuka eyeekubiriza obutabeera na mirimu naddala egyo gye wasoma kuba egiriwo mukyaafu, sisinkana mukazimukulu Christine Nansubuga Lwemwa ow'emyaka 75, eyimirizzaawo obulamu bwe ku mulimu gw'okukuba bulooka.
Ono ayimirizawo famire ye, okuweerera abaana n'abazukulu n'okuyimirizaawo famire mu ngeri z'enjawulo okukakasa nti ye n'ebennyumba ye babeera mu bulamu obulungi era obweyagaza.

OBUBAKA ERI ABAGAYA EMIRIMU
Nansubuga agamba ku myaka 75 asoboola okwetusaako buli kimu kyokka waliwo abavubuka abatayagala kukola nga balinda kubba. "Ssente y'ekibi terimu ssannyu okujjako ebikolimo", bw'agamba.
Abakyala bangi kasita bafiirwako abaami baabwe batandika okwekubagiza n'okweyita bannamwandu wabula nga singa omuntu amalirira asobola okweyimirizaawo.

Abalagidde basooke banoonyereze ku baamuwandiika ng’ayingira poliisi.
Omala yategeezezza Bukedde nti, lwaki balinze ng’abuzaayo emyezi 10 awummule emirimu gya poliisi balyoke bafulumye ebintu ng’ebyo ebitategeerekeka.
“Bwe baba baagala kutunoonyerezaako bamanyi we batusanga bajje bakikole” Omala bwe yaggumizza mu ddoboozi ekkangufu.
Yagambye nti bye boogera wolokoso era ky’atayinza kukweka kye ky’okubeera nti yalangiridde dda nti agenda kuvuganya mu byobufuzi wabula mu kiseera kino akyali muserikale mu poliisi era tayinza kulaga ludda, langi wadde ekibiina kw’agenda okuvuganyiza.
Kiddiridde Poliisi okufulumya olukalala lwa boofiisa baayo 21 be banoonyerezaako ku by’okukozesa empapula z’obuyigirize enjingirire. Kuliko; abali ku madaala nga Assistant Commission of Police (ACP), Supretendat Of Police (SP), Assistant Supretendat Of Police (ASP).
Omala y’omu ku baabadde ku lukalala. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga Fred Enanga yategeezezza Bukedde nti ensonga zino zirina kukwasibwa kitongole kya CID kinoonyereze era bwe kinaamalirizza, akikulira ajja kuwa lipooti.

Abakulembeze bw’Ekkanisa y’Abadiventi mu Uganda abakulembeddwamu Ssabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa y’Abadiventi Pastor Dr Moses Maka Ndimukika bakiise embuga nebasisinkana Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga.
Bakiise embuga mungeri eyokunyweeza enkolagana wakati we Kanisa n’Obwakabaka,
Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa y’Abadiventi Pastor Dr Moses Maka Ndimukika yeebazizza Katikkiro olw’engeri gy’akumyekumyemu Obwakabaka mu kiseera ekitabadde kyangu, ekijjuddemu omuyaga gw’ebyobufuzi n’ebyenfuna ebiyuugayuuga.
Omulabirizi wa Central Uganda Conference Omusumba Samuel Kajoba nga yaakulembeddemu Okusabira Obwakabaka,yebazizza Katonda Olw’okukuuma abakulembeze Ssaabasajja basiima naalonda bamukulemberereko Obwakabaka, n’Okubasobozesa okubukulaakulanya.
Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga aabasuubizza nti wakunywererera ku kiragiro Kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka eky’okukuumira abantube mu mukwano n’Obumu , nga emu ku mpaji y’enkulaakulana mu Bwakabaka ne Uganda yonna.
Katikkiro agambye nti abakulembeze okusoosowaza obwenkanya, okukola ekituufu nókulondoola amazima byebimu ku biyamba okutumbula enkulakulana yensi.
Ssabalabirizi w’ekkanisa y’Abadiventi eyawummula John Kakembo, agambye nti ebibala ekkanisa kweyimiridde mu biro bino, by’Abavubuka abeyongedde okwagala okuweereza Omukama.
Bisakidddwa: Kato Denis

Gavumenti yataddewo obuwumbi bwa sente za Uganda 65 nga zino zigenda kukozesebwa okugula Kamera Zikalondoozi oba zibuli wooli nkulaba ezignda okulondoola obumenyi bw’amateeka. Poliisi yeyawereddwa omulimu gw’okugula Kamera zino nga kino balina okukikola ng’omwaka gw’ebyensimbi guno tegunaba kugwako. Moses Masiko mukugu mubyokwerinda naddala ku ludda olwa Kamera ezikozesebwa mu kulwanyisa obumenyi bw’amateeka. Ono alabudde nti banauganda besunge kitono kuba bayinza obutazifunamu okujjako ngebirina okukolebwa bikoleddwa.

Chapter 1
1 Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi asatu mu mwezi ogw'okuna ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'okutaano, bwe nnali ndi mu basibe ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali, eggulu ne libikkulibwa, ne ndaba okwolesebwa kwa Katonda.
2 Ku lunaku olw'okutaano olw'omwezi, gwe gwali omwaka ogw'okutaano ogw'okusibibwa kwa kabaka Yekoyakini,
3 ekigambo kya Mukama ne kijjirira ddala Ezeekyeri kabona mutabani wa Buuzi mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali; omukono gwa Mukama ne gubeera ku ye eyo.
4 Awo ne n
... 
Ebiramu ne biddukana mbiro ne bikomawo ng'ekifaananyi eky'okumyansa kw'eggulu.
15 Awo bwe nnali nga ntunuulira ebiramu ebyo, laba, nnamuziga ku ttaka ku mabbali g'ebiramu, buli bwenyi ku bwenyi bwabyo obuna nnamuziga omu.
16 Embala eya bannamuziga n'omulimu gwabwe baafaanana ebbala erya berulo: era abo abana baalina ekifaananyi kimu: n'embala yaabwe n'omulimu gwabwe byali nga nnamuziga ali wakati wa nnamuziga.
17 Bwe baatambulanga baatambuliranga ku mbiriizi zaabwe ennya: tebaakyuka bwe baatambu
...
ba ng'ebbala ery'ezaabu etabuddwamu effeeza, ng'embala ey'omuliro munda mu yo enjuyi zonna, okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okwambuka; era okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okukka, nalaba ng'embala ey'omuliro, era waaliwo okumasamasa okumwetoolodde.
28 Ng'embala eya musoke aba ku kire ku lunaku olw'enkuba, bw'etyo bwe yali embala ey'okumasamasa enjuyi zonna. Eno ye yali embala ey'ekifaananyi eky'ekitiibwa kya Mukama. Awo bwe nnakiraba, ne nvuunama amaaso gange, ne mpulira eddoboozi ly'oyo eyayogera.

Obadde okimanyi nti osobola okufuna obukadde 22 mu myezi ena okuva mu butungulu? Okulima obutungulu bizinensi efuna ekiralu singa obulimira mu kifo ekituufu naddala mu nsozi awannyogovu, okubala sizoni n'okugula ensigo entuufu.
Yiika okugirongoosa kirungi n'okozesa tulakita kuba ettaka lyetaaga okuba nga liyiikayiika era nga ggonvu kuba emirandira gy'obutungulu minafu. Nga yiika eyinza okugirimira 150,000/-.
Weetaaga ensigo y'omulembe kkiro emu ku 750,000/- oba kakadde.
Olina okussaaamu ebigimus
... 
mu ya 250,000/- n'osaasaanya 1,750,000/-.
Eddagala; kkiro 10 eza mancozeb nga buli emu egula 13,000/- oba 14,000/-. Nga wano weetaaga 130,000/- oba 140,000/-.
Eddagala eritta ebiwuka (pesticide), kkiro ssatu buli emu ku 60,000/-. Nga wano weetaaga 120,000/-.
Eddagala eriwonya nga waliwo obulwadde (curative), kkiro bbiri buli emu ku 60,000/- nga wetaaga 120,000/-.
Ekijimusa kya NPK kkiro 80 ku 3,000/- buli emu olwo nga wetaaga 240,000/-.
Can kkiro 80 ku 3,000/- buli kkiro nga wano weetaaga 240,00
...
gulamu ttani 15-20 nga buli kkiro ya 1,500/-. Wano obeera ofuna 22,500,000 oba obukadde 30.

Amawulire
Ababaka ba palamenti batabuse
Ababaka ba palamenti abava ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti, abataliiko luuyi n’abagobwa mu NRM basabye bannayuganda obutassa kitiibwa mu by’okugoba loodimeeya.
Nga boogerako eri bannamawulire, ababaka bano bagambye nti ku lw’okutaano lwa ssabiiti eno, bagenda kuwerekera loodimeeya okudda mu ofiisi ye kubanga agirimu mu mateeka.
Nampala w’abavuganya omubaka Winifred Kiiza agamba nti olukiiko olwagobye Lukwago lumenya mateeka era nga ebyaluvuddemu bikyaamu Ababaka bano kubaddeko Mathias Mpuuga, Alice Alaso FDC, Dr Lulume Bayiga, Paul Mwiru Rev Jacinto Ogwal Betty Nambooze, Theodore Sekikubo ne Barnabas Tinkasimire.
Bano bagamba nti nebagenda kukkiriza muntu yenna kumenya seemateeka Bino bizze nga minista frank Tumwebaze yakamla okweddiza emirimu gya loodimeeya.

OMUMYUKA w’omwogezi wa Gavumenti Col. Shaban Bantariza alabudde abakyala b’e Lugazi obutalimbibwa bavubuka ku kukyusa bukulembeze nga babuggya ku Pulezidenti Museveni n’agamba nti baagala kutuzza gye twava.
Yawadde abakyala amagezi nti, bwe balaba nga waliwo ebitabatuukako balonde abakulembeze be balaba nga balina obusobozi okutuuka eri omukulu alina ekyagi omuva emmere.
Col. Bantariza yabitegeezezza ebibiina by’abakyala ebyasobye mu 200, abaabadde ku ssomero lya Lugazi Umea P/S mu nteekateeka y’okusisinkana abakulu okuva mu Gavumenti okulaba engeri ebibiina gye bisobola okuyambibwamui okwekulaakulanya.

Bya DAVID KIBANGA
NGA Herman Wasswa yaakalemwa okufuna ttiimu emugula e Vietnam, muteebi munne mu KCC, Tony Odur yasitudde ku Lwokuna n’addayo (e Vietnam) atuukirize ekirooto ky’okuzannya ku mupiira ogw’ensimbi.
Emu ku ttiimu z’agenda okugezesebwamu ye Sai Gon FC, eyasalako Geoffrey Kizito ‘Baba’ ne Moses Oloya. Okugenda kwa Odur kulese KCC mu kattu nga kati erina omuteebi omu (Herman Wasswa) kyokka nga be bagenda okukiikirira Uganda mu Africa Champions League.
Omuwandiisi wa KCC FC, David Tamale yakakasizza okugenda kwa Odur e Vietnam bwe yagambye nti, “Teyatubuulidde ttiimu mw’agenze naye yatusabye ne tumukkiriza.”
tumukkirize agezese emikisa gya pulofeesono ne tumukkiriza,” Tamale bwe yategeezezza.
Oluzannya lwa liigi olusoka lugenze okuggwaako nga Odur y’akulembedde abateebi ne ggoolo 11 nga yasembyeyo kuteeba nga bawangula URA FC (3-2) e Lugazi ku Lwokubiri.
Ate omuwuwuttanyi wa Cranes, Tony Mawejje yavudde mu IBV FC eya Iceland ne yegatta ku Haugesund eya Norway.
Haugesund yamalidde mu kya 3 mu liigi ya babinywera eya Norway era esuubirwa okuzannya EUROPA omwaka ogujja.

Bya RUTH NAZZIWA
Omuwendo gw’abantu abakwatibwa endwadde ezitasiigibwa gw’eyongedde ensangi zino.
Dr. Gerald Mutungi, okuva mu kitongole ky’ebyobulamu agamba nti mu mwaka gwa 2010, abantu abasoba mu 1,000,000 be bateeberezebwa okufa oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa endwadde zino. Mu kiseera kino, ku bantu 100 abafa, 43 babeera n’endwadde zino.
Okunywa ennyo omwenge, sigala, okukozesa ebiragalalagala, obutakola dduyiro n’endya embi, by’ebisinze okuvaako abantu okufuna endwadde zino.

Mu mbeera eno, omuntu atayagala kwongera ku buzito bwa mubiri gwe alina okulya emmere ey’ekigero n’atawuukuuka.
2 Tolya bisiikesiike wadde ebisava: Nga tonnateeka kyakulya kyonna mu kamwa, sooka okyetegereze okakase nga ky’osaanidde okuyingiza mu lubuto n’omubiri gwo.
3 Weewale okubeera n’abakusindiikiriza okulya (ekinyumu): Kino kikuyamba obutamala galya buli ky’osanze okuva ku by’oba wasalawo.

...
a abantu abakosebwa ebiragalalagala okuva ku Hope and Beyond Rehabilitation Centre e Lubaga agamba nti omwenge gwa bulabe nnyo era nagwo olina okugwewala oba okunywa mu bipimo ebisaanidde kuba bw’oguyitiriza gwongera ku buzito bw’omubiriekissa obulamu bwo mu matigga.
5 Dduyiro: Hussein Kateregga omukugu mu kukozesa obujjanjabi bwa dduyiro agamba nti, buli muntu alina okukola dduyiro kikusobozese okuziyiza omugejjo.
Oyinza okudduka, okuzina, okuzannya omupiira, okubuuka omugwa, okuwuga n’ebirala.

RDC wa Kira, Isaac Kawonawo kirabika akyamanyi okusala ddansi. Omanyi olwawulidde nti mukama we, manya Pulezidenti awangudde akalulu n'agenda ng'ayita mu bantu be abaabadde bakoze obubaga mu bitundu eby'enjawulo ajaganyize wamu nabo.
Twamuguddeko ku Don Courts e Kira ng'emiziki gimuyingidde era abaabaddewo kwe kumuwa ekyanya n'atandika okulaga ku ky'alinawo. Mu birala ebyamuleese essanyu mwe mwabadde n'abavubuka abeeyise aba FDC abaagambye nti ‘baalokose' ne balaba omusana ne badda ku ttiimu empanguzi eya NRM.
Janet Rutaboorwa (atudde ku ddyo) gwe baakazaako erya Maama Kyama ng'ono mukubiriza okuva mu ofi isi y'obwapulezidenti ne Juliet Kaniini nabo bwe baalabye RDC Kawonawo (mu ssaati ez'ebukuubo) ng'atabukidde omuziki kwe kumuwa engalo.
RDC yalumbye ne ku Kazinga Main ne yeegatta ku baayo okwabadde Henry Kabanda (mu ssaati enzirugavu), ssentebe w'ekyalo nga naye wa Tukole Task Force ebadde enoonyeza pulezidenti akalulu ne Martin Kabanda, ssentebe wa NRM ku kyalo ne batema ddansi n'okusala keeki nga bajaguza obuwanguzi.

Bino babituseeko munsisinkano gyebabaddemu n’abakulembeze kumitendera egitali gimu nga batunulidde obulabe obuletebwa obulwadde bwakafuba (TB)
Mukyala Specioza Namyalo nga yakulira ekibiina kyabaliko obulemu mu disitulukiti eno ki Bukomansimbi Disabled Persons Living with HIV and AIDs (BUDIPHA) agamba nti ku b
...

Sentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi Nnyenje Fred Kayiira agamba nti ekirwadde kya Covid 19 kyekiviriddeko akawuka kamukenenya okwongera okwegirisa olwokusulirira obujanjabi bwako nebadda mukulwanyisa covid 19 wabula nawa essuubi nti bagenda kwelwanako nga bwegwali. Ono ayongeddeko nga bwekigenda okufuuka eky’eteeka ok
...
.
Amyuka Pokino Mwalimu Kato Abdullah asinzidde wano nasaba gavumenti okwongera kubuwereeza eri abantu abaliko obulemu gamba nga amalwaliiro, amassomero n’ebirala so sikubalinda mubudde bwabululu bwokka.
Ssenkulu wekitongole ki BUDIPHA Musisi Richard asabye abaami ba Kabaka okubakwasizaako mukubunyisa obubaka obukwata kukawuka ka sirimu nakafuba kibayambeko okuzuula abo abakalina nokukalwanyisa.
Abamu kubaliko obulemu bategezeezza nti ebimu kubibasomooza ye entambula, ebbula lyeddagala nebirala.

Gavumenti esabye abakulu bamasomero okulaba nti bateeka munkola kaliculaamu empya nokutandika nábayizi abaseniya esooka
Minisitule evunanyizibwa ku byenjigiriza ne byemizannyo mu ggwanga yatongoza kaliculaamu eno mu mwezi ogwokubiri omwaka oguwedde ne kigendererwa okusomesa abayizi ebintu ebibagasa mu kifo kyokusoma omuwawa
Mu kwogerako ne bannamawulire mu Kampala, the Dayirekita wekitongole kya gavt ekivunanyizbwa ku byensoma ki National Curriculum Development Center, Grace Baguma, agambye nti bafunye amawulire nti amasomero ebisomesebwa ebigya ebwabaweebwa babivaako dda
Wano wasabidde bakalondoozi ba masomero ku zidisitulikiti okulabula masomero mu bitundu byabwe balabe nti entekateeka eno etekebwa mu nkola

...

Akena nga tannafa yategeeza muganda we John Paul Nyeko nti omusajja eyali amuleese mu ddwaaliro y’eyali amukubye amasasi oluvannyuma lw’okukolobola emmotoka ye.
Akena yali avuga Premio nti era yali adda ekyennyumannyuma, n’atomera emmotoka ya Kanyamunyu ey’ekika kya Prado TX.

ereza nti ye yakuba Akena essasi mu butanwa.

Olwavudde mu kkooti, Kanyamunyu ne muganzi we Munwangari batambulidde mu Land Cruiser okudda awaka.
Mu kkooti, abamu ku bantu beewunyiza omuwala omulungi nga Cynthia Munwangari okwenyigira mu kutta Akena era bawuliddwako nga bagamba nti obulungi bwe bwa musaayi kiswaza nnyo.

Amawulire
Gwebataliyirira awawabidde UNRA
Bya Ruth Anderah
Ekitongole kyebyengudo mu gwanga, Uganda National Roads Authority bakiwawabidde mu mbuga.
Waliwo omusubuzi abatutte mu mbuga ngayagala kumuliyirira obuwumbi 2 nobukadde 100 nga yoomu ku bakosebwa mu polojekiti yokukola oluguudo lwa Kira-Matugga.
Ettaka mwebayisa oluguudo lisangibwa ku block 185, plot 967 a Namugongo ku luguudo oluva e Kira okudda e Kasangati.
John Mugisha mu mpaaba gyeyatadde mu kooti enkulu etawuluza enkayana agamba nti mu ttaka lino mwalimu, ekizmbe kye ngazimba woteeri, lyetoloddwa olusozi nebintu ebirala ebyomuwendo.
Okuyita mu bannamateeka be aba Rutebemberwa and Co Advocates, agamba nti emirimu gye mingi egyagotaana, olwebintu bye byebayonoona.
Ono agamba nti nga 13 mu Decemba wa 2018, UNRA yamulagira ayimirize emirimu gye ku ttaka lino, oluvanyuma nga 26 March 2019 nabategeeza mu butongole nti lino ttaka lye songa yali akoseddwa olwemirimu gyokukola oluguudo.
Mu April wa 2019, bamubalirira, ngalina okusasulwa obuwumbi 4 nobukadde 600 ate mu Septemba nga 17 2020, UNRA baddamu nebamutegeeza nti bazeemu nebamubalirirra mu kwetegereza, ssente nebazsisala okudda ku buwumbi 2 nobukadde 800.
Kati ayagala kooti ekake UNRA, okumusasula bamuteremu nezensusuuba obukadde 21 olwokumugotaanya.

Katikkiro agguddewo Olusirika Lw’Olukiiko lwa Buganda ku Buganda Royal Institute e Mengo. wansi w’omulamwa, “Okuzimba Obukulembeze obuzza Buganda ku Ntukko”. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga akunze Obuganda okulonda abakulembeze okusinziira ku busobozi bwabwe sso si nzikiriza. Mayiga abadde ayogerako eri ababaka mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda agamba nti abantu okweyawula ku nsonga ze batalinaako buyinza, kizza ggwanga mabega.Okwawukanako n’entuula z’olukiiko endala, ku mulundi guno, ababaka batudde ku Buganda Royal Institute e Mmengo olw’ensonga za COVID-19.

EGGULO ku Lwokutaano, Winnie Nannyondo ne Halima Nakayi baayiseewo okwesogga semi mu mita 800 mu misinde gy'ensi yonna egya IAAF World Championship egiyindira mu kibuga Doha ekya Qatar.
Leero ku Lwomukaaga ku ssaawa 3:55 ez'ekiro, baakudda mu nsiike okulaba nga beesogga fayinolo.
Nakayi, yeesigamye ku mutindo gwe yassizzaawo mu mizannyo gya Afrika mwe yawangulidde omudaali ogw'ekikomo okulaba ng'ava e Doha ng'alina omudaali.
Mu mutendera mwe yaddukidde mu z'okusunsulamu ezaasoose, Nanyondo ye yakulembedde banne nga mita 800 yazidukidde mu ddakiika 2:01.19. Ajjukirwa mu mizannyo gya Commonwealth bwe yawangula omudaali gw'ekikomo era aluubirira okutuuka ku fayinolo asobole okuwangula omudaali.

Amawulire
Bannabyabufuzi beebuuza obuvumu Gavt gyebujja okusenza bannansi ba Afghanstan
Bannabyabufuzi batandise okusoya gavt ya NRM ebibuuzo ebyekuusa kukukuuma eddembe lyobuntu eryooke ebudamye bannansi ba afghanstan abadduse obukambwe bwa Bataliban.
Okusinzira ku senkagale we kibiina kye byobufuzi ekya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT) Rtd Maj. Gen Mugisha Muntu, bannansi ba Afghan bali mukudduka ebikolwa ebyokutyoboola eddembe lyobuntu oluvanyuma lwa bateliban okuwamba obuyinza kyokka ne mu Uganda gye baddukidde ebikolwa bino gyebiri.
Alipoota ezénjawulo ezize zikolebwa akakiiko akalwanirira eddembe lyobuntu mu ggwanga lino zizze ziraga nti abakuuma ddembe bakwata kisooka mu kulinyirira eddembe lya bannasi
Mu kwogerako ne bannamawulire ku kitebe kye kibiina mu Kampala, Muntu agamba nti yadde nga asaasira banansi ba Afghan, gavt ya Uganda erina okusosowaza ensonga yokukuuma eddembe ryobuntu nokukola ku biruma bannauganda nga bannakasese ababonabona na mataba.
Uganda esuubirwa okubudamya bannansi ba Afghanistan abasoba mu 2000.
Wabula gavt egamba nti tewali munwe gwannusu gwegenda kusasanyiza ku bantu bano kuba America yakubawa buli kimu.

Abakazi bano kuliko; Gorrete Akumo 33, Atim Raymond 26, ne Achan Jenipher 33, nga batuuze b’e Mengo - Kisenyi.
Engoye baabadde bazibbye mu dduuka lya Hariet Nalunkuuma nga beefuude bakasitoma nga beebikkiridde nga bahajati.
Nalunkuuma yabeekengedde n’akunga abatuuze abatandise okubakuba okwagala okubatta era wano poliisi w’eyatuukidde n’erwanagana nabo okusobola okubataasa.
Nalunkuuma nnannyini dduuka yagambye nti abakazi bano lumu baagenda ku dduuka ne bamubba bwe yali aleseewo bba mu dduuka ne batwala engoye za ssente 35,000/-.
Abakazi bano nga batuuse ku poliisi baagambye nti, engoye ze baabasanze nazo baabadde baziguze. Omusango guli ku fayiro nnamba SD16/19/09/2018.

Bya Ritah Kemigisa
Muzeeyi, Nathan Okori, taata w’omugenzi Jacob Oulanyah azeemu nalumiriza nti mutabani we bamuwa butwa.
Ono ayogeddeko eri abazisi, abakuganidd ku ssomero lya Ajuri P/S mu gombolola ye Lalogi mu disitulikiti ye Omoro, ngagambye nti mutabani we yamutegezaako ku nsonga eno.
Kino asabye abantu okukitwala mu mutima mulungi, nga bino byonna ssentekaggale wa DP, Nobert Mao yabadde amuvvunula.
Okori 
... 
bye gavumenti okuyambako ku baana bonna omugenzi babadde alabirira, era asabye sipiika wa palamenti Anita Among okufaayo okukuuma ebyobugagga byomugenzi, byalese.
Wabula kinajjukirwa nti alipoota zabasawo, zalaga nti omugenzi yafa kokolo, nobuvune obulala obwali butuuse ku bitundu bye byomunda mu mubiri.
Bino byali mua alipoota eyasomwa minisita webyobulamu Jane Ruth Aceng.
Mu kusooka, Ssabalabirizi wekkanisa ya Uganda eyawummula Henry Luke Orombi asabye abakulembeze mu kitundu kyamambuka gegwan
...
anga awamu okuteekanga Katonda mu kifo ekisooka.
Ayogeddde ku busosoze mu mawanga, obukyayi, okweyagaliza nebirala byalabudde nti bigenda kukosa ensi.
Wabula wakati mu kusaba okubadde kugenda mu maaso, empewo eyakazimu enawuse nekub ku ttaka weema ebadd yatekeddwamu omubiri gwomugenzi Oulanyah.
Kino kireseewo akajagalalo okumala edakiika, ngoluvanyuma embeera emaze nedda mu nteeko.
Okusaba kuno kwekukulembeddemu okugalamiza omugenzi mu nnyumba ye, eyoluberera okugenda okuberawo eggulo lya leero.

POLIISI ya Kampalamukadde eggalidde omusajja agambibwa okufera abantu ng'akozesa ofiisi ez'enjawulo n'abaggyako ensimbi. Christopher Kiddu 48, eyeeyita Polofeesa Kiddu omutuuze w'e Bulenga mu disitulikiti y'e Wakiso ye yakwatiddwa oluvannyuma lw'okufera abantu.
Abamu ku bantu be yafera kuliko Edith Nambiribwa. Kigambibwa nti mu mwezi July, 2019, yamuggyako ssente ezisukka mu1,000,000/- n'amulimba nti akola mu KCCA. Yamusuubiza okumufunira omulimu ogw'obuwandiisi kyokka kyamubuukako bwe yatuuka k
... 
ti Kiddu tebamumanyi.
Yamukubira essimu nga tagikwata n'amuloopa ku poliisi y'e Lungujja ne bamuggulako omusango gw'okufuna ssente mu lukujjukujju ku ffayiro nnamba SD 25/28/08/2019. Kigambibwa nti Kiddu yeeyambisa essimu ya Vicent Kamoga n'asaba abantu ssente.
Kamoga agamba nti mukwano gwe eyajja ne Kiddu ku wooteeri ya Tarvan Woods e Kabuusu ye yamumwanjulira. Wabula, baali bakyesanyusa Kiddu n'asaba Kamoga ku ssimu ye ng'amutegeeza nga bwe yali alina omuntu gwe yali ayagala okukubira ng'alina
...
uwa.
Bwe yatwala essimu ye, alina kye yagikola era amasimu ga Kamoga nga y'agafuna. Yakozesa omukisa ogwo okusaba abantu ssente era abamu ku bantu abasindikira Kiddu ssente be baategeeza Kamoga. Kamoga yasalawo okugenda mu kkampuni ya MTN n'akizuula nti essimu kwe baasindikanga ssente yali ya Kiddu.
Kamoga yaddukira ku poliisi y'e Lubaga ne bakwata Kiddu ne bamugulako omusango gw'okukozesa obubi kkompyuta ku ssimu ye ku ffayiro nnamba SD:06/21/01/2020 era kati akuumirwa ku poliisi ya Old Kampala

Nicholas Tuesday Arineitwe nga abadde ayagala bbendera ya NRM eya Ndorwa East yavudde mu lwokaano nga alumirizza Bahati okukakwatamu nga tebanaba nakulonda.

... 
 e Kabale nategeeza nga bwatagenda kuvuganya mu kalulu kano akagenda okubaawo ku Lwokutaano.

Omuwandiisi w’ekibiina e Kabale Maurice Mugenga Keitaba yakakasizza nga bweyafunye ebbaluwa ya Arineitwe nga ekakasa nga bwavudde mu lwokaano.

ko k’ebyokulonda e Kabale keetengeredde era kajja kulaga obwenkanya.

Ono yalumiriza abamu ku b’ebyokwerinda okumutiisatiisa era nasalawo kaadi y’ekibiina agireke yeesimbewo ku lulwe nga omuntu.

Buli muntu alina okwekuuma okulaba ng’atangira ssennyiga ono okumukwata.
1 Weewale okukwata mu ngalo z’abantu kubanga akawuka katambuliramu nnyo.
2 Weewale okukwata ku bintu ebingi kubanga tomanya abaasoose okubikwatako oba balamu oba balwadde.
3 Weewale okukwatirira omumwa n’ennyindo yo kubanga bye bisinga okukwatibwa amangu ssennyiga ono.
4 Bw’obeera olwadde oba ng’olina gw’omanyi nti, amufunye mukubirize okugenda amangu mu ddwaaliro okufuna obuyambi okutaasa obulamu bwe n’obw’abalala.

Akulira abasawo b’ekinnansi abeegattira mu kibiina kya Nakazadde Uganda N’eddagala Lyayo nga ye ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyobuwanga mu Bwakyabazinga bwa Busoga, Patrick Mudhungu (Uncle Samona), asabye abasawo b’ekinnansi okuwagira Gavumenti kubanga ebawadde emirembe.
Bino yabyogedde mu kwaniriza omwaka gwa 2023, mu maka ga Ssaababonesebwa w’abasawo b’ekinnansi, Kabona Kazibwe Lubanga e Ssesanga mu muluka gw’e Masuliita mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso. Mudhungu agamba nti yeewuunya okulaba ng’abasawo b’ekinnansi balwanyisa gavument ng’ate ebawadde emirembe n’abalabula obuteenyigira mu byabufuzi kubanga tebigenda kubayamba

Gavumenti ya Uganda ne China batongoza technologiya agenda okuyamba kubantu mu district ye Kalungu nebitundu ebilinaanyewo okulakulana.
Bo abakulembeze be Kalungu baanirizza entekateeka y’okubangula abatuuze mu tekinologiya wa kkompyuta ku bwererere.
Kino kigenderedwamu okubawa obukoddyo bw’okutundira eby’amaguzi byabwe ku mitimbagano n’okukolerako eby’enjawulo ebivaamu ensimbi.
Omuwabuzi w’omukulembeze owokuntiko- Vincent Ssempijja ye yayanjudde Pulojekiti eno emanyiddwa nga The Huawei DigiTruc
... 
ga be bagenda okuganyulwa.
Bano bajja kuweebwa obukoddyo bwokweyambisa kkompyuta n’essimu okulaga eby’amaguzi byabwe eri abaguzi mu nsi yonna.
Kino kijja kubasobozesa okuyingiza ensimbi ezeegasa kyokka yabakubirizza okukulembeza obuyonjo n’omutindo.
Abalala kuliko ba makanika naddala ab’ebidduka by’ensangi zino ebyetaaga kkompyuta okukanikibwa,abayiiya mu ngeri zonna ez’ekiddugavu.
Era, ne banna katemba nabo baasabidwa okulaga kye basobola okuguza ensi beefunire ensimbi nga basinziira ku mitimba

rala ebyetaagisa nti egenda okwetoloola obunyomero bwa Kalungu bwonna,nga baakusomesa abantu 40 buli lunaku okumala ebbanga eritali ggere.

Abalunzi mu ggombolola ye Ngogwe ne Ssi Bukunja mu district ye Buikwe beraliikirivu,olw ‘ekirwadde ekirumbye amagana gabwe ekiyitibwa Ekifuluuto (Lampy skin).
Ente 82 zezaakazuulibwa n’ekirwadde nga n’ezimu zitandise okufa.
Okusinzira Ku basawo ekirwadde kino kiviirako ente okubutuka , n’okukulukuta eminyira era ng’esobola okufa.
Abalunzi nga bakulembedwamu Ssekitooleko Henry okuva mu muluka gwe Lubongo, bawanjagide abakulu ku district okubasalira amagezi bataase amagana gabwe.
Dr.Mwanje Gerald akulira eby’ebisolo mu district ye Buikwe ategezezza nti mu kiseera kino district terina nsimbi zakugema magana gonna mu nkola ey’ekikungo.
Wabula abasawo b’ebisolo ku maggombolola balagiddwa okukwatagana n’abasawo abakola egyabwe, okuyambako abalunzi okugema n’okujanjaba ku nsimbi ez’ekigero.
Bisakiddwa: Sseruyange Christopher

Amawulire
Onebe yeegaanye ebyókutta eyali Mukyalawe
Bya Ruth Anderah,
Omubalirizi w’ebitabo omukulu, Francis Onebe yeegaanyi okutta eyali mukyala we Immaculate Mary Blessing Onebe ng’oludda oluwaabi bwe lulumiriza.
Onebe ow’emyaka 62 alabiseeko mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu Michael Elubu amusomedde omusango gw’obutemu n’agwegaana.
Ono avunaanibwa wamu ne Bonny Oriekot ow’emyaka 26, omukuumi eyeegattira mu kkampuni ya Pentagon Security Company.
Kigambibwa nti Immaculate Onebe yatemulwa mu January wa 2021 omulambo gwe ne gusuulibwa mu ttanka y’amazzi amakyafu poliisi gye yazuula mu maka gaabwe e Mawanga zooni Munyonyo mu divizoni y’e Makindye.
Kati okuwulira omusango kutandise nómujjulizi w’oludda oluwaabi asoose nga ye musawo okuva mu ggwanika e Mulago.

Bwe yabadde ayogera eri abayizi abaakwasiddwa ebbaluwa akulira ebyokwekulaakulanya mu bbanka eno Tony Otoa, yagambye nti abayizi abaatikkiddwa bakyuse kinene mu nzirukanya y'emirimu olw'obukugu bwe bafunye. Mu bye baabanguddwa mulimu enkola y'endagaano mu bizinensi, enkwata

a GIZ Employment and Skills for Eastern Africa programme. Patrick Mweheire, akulira bbanka eno yagambye nti zaakubasobozesa okusenvula n'okusembeza empeereza eno mu bitundu by'eggwanga ebirala gye bateeka teeka okussa amatabi aganaabangula abantu mu bitundu ebyo.
Ye Ernest Rubondo akulira ekitongole kya Petroleum Authority of Uganda yasiimye enkola eno era n'akakasa nga bw'egenda okubangula abakozi era ekendeeze eky'okuleetanga abagwira okuggussa emirimu egitali gimu buli lwe wabeerawo obwetaavu

Kooti y’ekitongole ekivunanyizibwa kukuwandiisa amakampuni mu ggwanga ki Uganda Registration Services Bureau URSB egobye omusango ogwawabwa Frank Gashumba ne Ssentebe wa District ye Lwengo Ibrahim Kitatta, mwebabadde bawakanyiza office ya ssentebe wa NRM era president wa Uganda eya Office of National Chairperson etuula e Kyambogo okukozesa engombo ya “Mzee omalako Jajja tova ku main”
Mu June 2023 Kitatta ne banne beekubira enduuli eri ekitongole kino nga baagala kiyimirize office eyo okumozesa engombo eyo n’ekifaananyi kya Museveni nga bagamba nti bebaabiyiiya era biriko abantu abalala ababikozesa era nti babirinako obwannannyini.
Omuwandiisi wa kooti y’ekitongole kya URSB Denis Birungi ategezezza nti okusinziira ku bujulizi obwaleetebwa mu kooti bakizudde nti offisi ya Pulezidenti yeyasooka okukozesa engombo eno.
Munamateeka w’akulira office eyo Hadija Namyalo nga ye Usama Ssebuufu agambye nti omuntu we yali yawandiisa dda ebigambo bino.
Wabula Frank Gashumba ne bane balaze obutali bumativu nensala eno era bagamba nti bakujulira
Gy’ebuvuddeko kooti yali yayimiriza okuddamu okukozesa engombo eyo eya “Mzee omalako Jajja tova ku main”.

Gavumenti yakujulira
Gavumenti etegeezezza nga bw’egenda okujulira ebivudde mu kooti nga bikakasa Erias Lukwago nga loodimeeya.
Kooti enkulu olunaku lwaleero ekirizza okuyimiriza eby’okussa mu nkola ebiri mu alipoota eyagoba Lukwago okutuusa ng’okwemulugunya kwe mu bulambalamba.
WAbula ekiwandiiko ekivudde ku kitebe kya gavumenti ekya mauwlire ekya Media center kitegeeza nga gavumenti bw’ekyebuuza ku ssabawolereza okulaba engeri y’okukwatamu ensonga.
Bino bizze nga Lukwago yakamala okusaba nti okulwana kukome okukola kutandike

Omwana yenna okukula obulungi, alina okulya obulungi ate era n'okusula obulungi mu kifo ekisanyusa ate nga kiyonjo.

4. Obukuumi obumala
Omuzadde olina okufaayo okulaba ng'ekisenge ky'abaana tekiriimu bintu biteeka bulamu bwabwe mu buzibu.
Ebintu ebisala, ebifumita n'enirala eby'obulabe tobireka mu kisenge kyabwe. Lydia Nyesigomwe, omukugu mu by'abaana agamaba nti, ekisenge ky'abaana kiteekemu kkabada mwe batereka ebyokuzannyisa byabwe n'ebintu ebirala bye bakozesa.

Kazimba asinzidde mu kusaba kwa leero ku Ssande mu maka ge n'ategeeza nti Uganda ebadde n'abakulembeze ab'enjawulo wabula nga bonna bavaako wakati mu kuyiwa omusaayi ate nga bonna bafiiridde ku buwang'anguse kye yasabye kireme kuddamu kubaawo.
"Nsaba Katonda naffe Uganda tubeereko n'omukulembeze awummudde mu mirembe ate afuuke eyeebuuzibwako eri abazzeewo kuba abasinga ababadde bafuga eggwanga nga bavaako wakati mu kuyiwa omusaayi ogw'amaanyi," Kazimba bw'ategeezezza.
Mu bubaka bwe bweyesigamizaako emyaka 58 bukya Uganda efuna bwetwaze, Kazimba era asabye ebikolwa eby'ettemu ssaako n'enjawukana mu by'obufuzi naddala ezirabikidde mu kulonda abakwatira ebibiina bbendera bikomezebwe abantu basobole okubeera mu mirembe ng'eng'ombo n'oluyimba lw'eggwanga Uganda bwe biri.

MWE MUSUZA ABANTU KU TEBUUKYE MU KAWEMPE;
Omumyuuka w’omwogezi wa
Uganda Police Force owa Kampala Metropolitan Police ASP Luke Owoyesigyire avuddeyo nategeeza nga Poliisi e Kawempe ekutte abantu 5 kubigambibwa nti babadde benyigira mu bubbi mu Kawempe n’ebitundu ebirinaanyeewo. Abasirikale ba Poliisi ababadde balawuna ekyalo bebayimirizza emotoka ekika kya Passo Nnamba UBH 295F eyabadde evugibwa Michael Yiga, 28, nga Makanika. Ku dashboard y’emotoka kwabaddeko enkofiira y’eggye lya Uganda People’s Defence Forces – UPDF era Yiga bweyabuuziddwa nategeeza nti yannannyini w’emotoka eno.
Yiga yabatutte ewa Ronald Ssenyonjo nga yennanyini motoka eyategeezezza nti enkofiira si yiye wabula nti emotoka alina abamaggye babiri batera okupangisa emotoka eno nga kirabika bebagyerabiddemu. Ono yabatutte gyebali nga omu kubbo ye Kanyehamye Kakistone, agambibwa okudduka mu maggye ne Juma Kaya, nga ekyomukisa bombi babadde bagenze ku Poliisi y’e Kanyanya okubaako gwebeyimirira nga kigambibwa nti yabbye akakadde kamu n’essimu ekika kya Infinix.
Oluvannyuma kyazuuliddwa nti Kanyehamye ne Kaya, wamu negwebabadde bazze okweyimirira babba bonna era nebalagira bagenda baaze gyebasula.
Mukukebera ennyumba zaabwe abasirikale basanzeemu ebintu ebigambibwa okubeera ebibbe wamu n’ebyambalo by’amaggye.

Entiisa ebuutikidde abatuuze ku kyalo Kagoma mu ggombolola y’e Nabweru mu Nansana Munusipaali oluvannyuma lw’okusanga omuwala ng’afiiridde mu kazigo mw’abadde asula.
Afudde ye Grace Akello 22 ng’abadde akola mu wooteeri e Kagoma.
Ono kigambibwa nti ekiro ekikeesezza leero yataddeko ebijjanjalo ne yeebaka, ng’abatuuze bamusanze ku mulyango nga kiraga nti yabadde agezaako okwerwanako afulume kyokka n’alemererwa.
Baasanze nga feesi yonna yayidde oluvannyuma ly’okugwa mu sepiki y’ebijjanjalo eyabadde ku sigiri.
Meeya w’e ggombolola y’e Nabweru, Jumba Kasim yasabye abatuuze okwewala okufumbiranga mu nnyumba kuba kya bulabe nga bangi bafiriiddwa obulamu bwabwe.
Oluvannyuma poliisi etutte omulambo gwe mu ggwanika ly’eddwaliro e Mulago, abasawo bagende mu maaso n’okugwekebejja.

Copyright

Okukola ekikwekweto kino, Poliisi yasoose kutemezebwako abantu nga bwe waliwo omukazi gwe balaba ayambuka waggulu ku kizimbe kino entakera n’akasawo akagambibwa nti mw’agitambuliza n’agiguza abavubuka abakuhhaanira mu bbaala esangibwa ku kizimbe kino ne waggulu waakyo.
Akulira ebikwekweto ku poliisi ya CPS, Ivan Nduhura yagambye nti oluvannyuma lw’okutemezebwako, abaserikale baasitukiddemu ne bazingako ekizimbe kino ne bakwata abantu 10 nga mu bano kwabaddeko omukazi eyeeyita Melisa ng’ono yasangiddwa n’emisokoto gy’enjaga mu kasawo gye yabadde aleese okuguza abavubuka. Kigambibwa nti asinga kugiguza baddereeva ba takisi.
“Twategeezeddwa nti Melisa buli lw’agenda ku kizimbe kino n’akasawo abeera akweseemu emisokoto gy’enjaga era bwe bamulabye ne batutuusaako amawulire ne tugenda ku kizimbe kya Platinum kwe kumukwata n’abalala,” Nduhura bwe yategeezezza.
Yagambye nti Melisa olwalabye poliisi n’ayagala okudduka wabula abaserikale ne bamukwata wakati mu kubalwanyisa. Yategeezezza nti guno mulundi gwakubiri nga poliisi ekwata Melisa.
Ogwasooka era yasangibwa n’emisokoto gy’enjaga mu kasawo. Yagambye nti waliwo abavubuka abakuhhaanira ku bizimbe waggulu ne bakommonterayo enjaga gye bava ne batandika okubba abantu n’abalala ne bavugisa ekimama.
Abaakwatiddwa batwaliddwa ku poliisi ya CPS era gye baaliiridde Paasika.

16 Samusooni n’alaga e Gaza n’alabayo omukazi malaaya, n’ayingira gy’ali. 2 Awo abantu ab’e Gaza ne bategeezebwa nga Samusooni bw’ali mu kifo ekyo. Ne bamuzingiza ne bamuteegera ku wankaaki w’ekibuga ekiro kyonna. Ne basiriikirira ekiro kyonna nga bagamba nti, “Obudde bwe bunaaba nga bunaatera okukya tunaamutta.”
3 Naye Samusooni ne yeebaka okutuusa ettumbi, n’agolokoka mu ttumbi, n’akwata enzigi ebbiri eza wankaaki w’ekibuga
... 
Oyinza otya okugamba nti onjagala, ate ng’omutima gwo teguli nange? Gino emirundi esatu onduulidde, n’otontegeeza amaanyi go amangi mwe gasibuka.” 16 Bw’atyo omukazi n’amusendasendanga n’ebigambo bye ennaku zonna ng’amubuuza okutuusa lwe yamwetamwa.
17 Awo Samusooni n’amubuulira ebyali ku mutima gwe byonna. N’amugamba nti, “Simwebwangako nviiri, kubanga ndi muwonge eri Katonda okuva mu lubuto lwa mmange. Bwe mwebwako enviiri, olwo amaanyi gange gananvaako, ne nnafuwa, ne mbeera ng’omuntu omulala
...
mu, n’omukono ogwa kkono nga guli ku ndala. 30 Samusooni n’ayogera nti, “Leka nfiire wamu n’Abafirisuuti.” N’asindika n’amaanyi ge gonna, essabo ne ligwa ku bakulembeze, n’abantu bonna abaalimu naye, era n’atta bangi mu kufa kwe okusinga ne be yatta nga mulamu.
31 Awo baganda be n’ennyumba yonna eya kitaawe ne bagenda ne baggyayo omulambo gwe, ne bagutwala ewaabwe, ne bamuziika mu ntaana ya kitaawe Manowa eyali wakati w’e Zola ne Esutaoli. Yali akulembedde Isirayiri okumala emyaka amakumi abiri.

Abeebyokwerinda ku kiggwa kya Bakatoliki e Namugongo baliko omuvubuka gwe bakutte oluvannyuma lw’okumulengera ng’adduka n’ensawo y’okumugongo eteeberezebwa okuba enzibe.
Akwatiddwa ye Fred Twinomukisa 21, omutuuze w’e Malongo mu muluka gw’e Namaalo mu disitulikiti y’e Kagadi. Mu budde buno akuumibwa baserikale era ng’atuuziddwa kumpi n’ensawo egambibwa okuba enzibe.
Omuserikale ataayagadde kumwatuukiriza linnya yategeezeza nti ono okumukwata kiddiridde okumulengera ng’adduka emisinde mu kiggwa bakira nga bw’atunula buli luuyi okukakasa nga tewali amulabye.
Annyonnyodde nti ensawo ebbiddwa baasanzeemu bintu bya kisajja okuli engoye engatto n’ebirala.
Wabula, Twinomukisa ategeezezza ng’esawo naye bw’abadde agironze era nga abadde agenda kugikuuma okutuusa lw’alaba nnyini yo abeebyokwerinda kye batamukkirizza kukola. Bano balaze ensawo endala ezaalondeddwa era nga bannyini zo tebannazuulibwa.

Gutti yalayiziddwa omuwabuzi wa kkooti eno mu by’amateeka Col. Richard Tukachungurwa era ng’ono y’omu ku bapya abaalondeddwa okukola nay
... 
ma Opar, Capt. Paul Mugerwa, W01 Paul Kamya, Col. Jame Rubahika, Maj. David Mbabazi Karyabashihsa, Maj Frank Tumwesigye ne W01 Jimmy Omara.
Oludda oluwaabi lwakukulirwa Maj. Raphael Mugisha nga waakuyambibwako Capt. Samuel Masereje ne Lt. Ambrose Baguma.
Wabula Gutti bw’abadde asiibula bannamawulire abaabadde basigadde nga bakuba ebifaananyi mu Kkooti eno abategeezezza nti wiiki ejja temugisubwa kuba esuubirwa okusabuukulula ekipya akaseera konna.
Kino bannamawulire baafulumye kkooti nga buli om

o akafubo akatakkiriziddwaamu bannamawulire era nga kaakulungudde essaawa ezisoba mu ssatu kyokka oluvannyuma kyazuuliddwa nti omuwabuzi wa kkooti mu by’amateeka Col. Katinda yabadde akwasa Col. Tukachungurwa eyamuddidde mu bigere w’ofiisi n’okumuyitiramu buli kimu nga bwe kirina okutambula.
Okulayira olwawedde abantu bonna okwabadde n’abaamawulire baalagiddwa okufuluma abaalondeddwa ku kakiiko ne baddamu okwenvumba akafubo.

Amawulire
BCU baakutondawo ebifo webakunganyiriza emwanyi
Bya Musasi Waffe
Bugisu Cooperative Union (BCU) bakutnadika okutondawo ebifo, mu bitundu bye gwanga ebyenjawulo, webakunganyiza emwanyi.
Kino kigendereddwamu okwongera amaanyi mu mirimu gyabwe, nokutaasa abalimi ababaddde babbibwa ba kayungirizi.
Kino kyatukiddwako mu ttabameruka wekibiina kyonbwegassi kino, eyatudde mu Industrial City Division mu kibuga e Mbale.
Ebifo bino ziyite zi ofiisi zekibiina bagambye nti zigenda kutekebwa e Sironko valley, Bugusege, Lambuli, Upper Central, Lower Central, Bubulo, Manafwa, Tsutsu ne Lwakhakha.
Minisita webibiina byobwegassi, Fredrick Ngobi Gume, yateabye mu ttabameruka ono, era nalabula abanatu abaloopaloopa nga bawanaknay emirimu gyebiina, songa ssi ba memba nti bakikomye.
Agambye nti bano bandiba nga blina ebigendererwa ebyokugotaanya emirimu, wabula nasiima nokutendereza obukulmbeze bwa ssentebbe Nathan Nandala.

3 nga tujjukira bulijjo omulimu gwammwe ogw'okukkiriza, n'okufuba okw'okwagala, n'okugumiikiriza okw'essuubi lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, mu maaso ga Katonda era Kitaffe;
4 nga tumanyi, ab'oluganda abaagalwa Katonda, okulondebwa kwammwe,
5 kubanga enjiri yaffe teyajja gye muli mu kigambo bugambo, wabula era ne mu maanyi, ne mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu, ne mu kutegeerera ddala okungi; nga bwe mumanyi bwe twali gye muli ku lwammwe.
6 Nammwe ne mutugoberera ffe ne Mukama waffe, bwe mwatoolera ekigambo mu kubonaabona okungi, n'essanyu ery'Omwoyo Omutukuvu;

10 n'okulindiriranga Omwana we okuva mu ggulu, gwe yazuukiza mu bafu, Yesu, atulokola mu busungu obugenda okujja.

Bya HUSSEIN BUKENYA
OBUWANGUZI Alex Isabirye, owa Victoria University bwe yatuuseeko oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula Vipers ku fayinolo ya Uganda Cup, bwasirisizza ebigambo by'abantu abamu ababadde bamuyita omutendesi ow'ekibogwe.
Mu makati ga sizoni eno Isabirye yagobwa mu URA nga bamulanga okugikonya, ne yeegatta ku Victoria University mwe yafuumuulidde bassita mukaaga abawagizi ne batandika okubisoma nga ne mu Victoria bw'atagenda kumalako, wabula yabeewuunyisizza ng'asitukidde mu Uganda Cup.
Mu myaka ena gy'amaze ku butendesi, awanguliddemu ebikopo bisatu, ekya liigi ne Uganda Cup bibiri (2). Vipers yeevuma ddiifiri.
Abakungu n'abazannyi ba Vipers beekokkola ddiifiri Dennis Batte gwe balumiriza okugabira Victoria peneti ng'obudde buweddeyo.
Maneja wa ttiimu eno, Lawrence Kato yagambye "Eddakiika 3 ezaayongeddwaamu mu kitundu zaabadde ziweddeyo.

Poliisi esse omusajja Fred Galimu myaka 42, abadde omutuuze ku kyalo Kanabi mu ggombolola y’e Bukamba mu disitulikiti y’e Jinja akawungeezi ka leero.
Galimu akubiddwa essasi mu butanwa, Poliisi bw’ebadde egumbulula abatuuze abalumbye amaka g’omutuuze Nenkude Murasi omusawo w’ekinnansi nga bamulumirizza okuloga ekitundu kyabwe.
Abatuuze bakoze effujjo omuli okwokya ennyumba ya Nenkude, okwonoona ebintu n’okwagala okumutta era Poliisi wetuukidde okutaasa ng’embeera etabanguse, abatuuze ne batandika okukuba Poliisi amayinja.
Poliisi mu kwetaasa, ekubye amasasi mu bbanga kyokka mu butanwa erimu likutte Galimu era afiiriddewo.
Michael Kasadha, omwogezi wa Poliisi mu bitundu bye Busoga North, agambye nti Poliisi etandiise okunoonyereza ku nfa ya Galimu.

Amawulire
Aba NUDIPU si bassanyufu ne Gavt
Bya Benjamin Jumbe,
Ekibiina omwegatira abantu abaliko obulemu mu ggwanga ki National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda, kyenyamidde olwa gavt okulemererwa okutekawo ebiyambako abantu abaliko obulemu mu ggwanga
Bino bibadde mu lukungana olugenderedde okutumbula nókukuuma eddembe lya bantu abaliko obulemu mu ggwanga.
Ensisinkano eno ebademu abakakiiko akavunayizibwa ku kukuuma eddembe lyobuntu mu ggwanga aka UHRC, ebitongole bya gavt ebyenjawulo ebikola ku baliko obulemu.
Akulira ekibiina kya NUDIPU, Esther Kyoziira, agamba nti abantu babwe bali mu bulamu obuteyagaza naye nga ebimu ku birina okubayamba birina kuva mu gavt.
Anokodeyo ekyokutendeka abasomesa abanabangula abantu abaiko obulemu, obutaba na bitabo mwe basomera nókuba nti bakalubirizibwa okufuna empereza ya gavt mu bifo ebyolukale.

HON, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu era nga ye mukulembeze we kibiina kya NUP kyadaaki ayimbuddwa okuva mu kkomera gyamaze ebbanga lya nnaku ezikunukkiriza mu 3.
Ono atereddwa mu kkooti e Iganga, era nga omulamuzi Jessica Chemeri y’amuyimbudde.
Kitegerekese nti ono atereddwa ku kakalu ka Kkooti, nga wakudda omusango gwe guwulirwe nga 18th December 2020.
Emisango egimuguddwako gyekuusa ku kunyomoola ebiragiro ebyatekebwawo okugobererwa ab’ebyobulamu, era ne biyisibwa n’olukiiko lwe Ggwanga olukulu.
Amaggye galabudde abantu.
Amyuka omwogezi wa maggye Lt. Col. Deo Akiiki ategezezza nti tewali muntu yenna agenda kukkirizibwa kubeera ku makubo okutandika ku ssawa 3 ez’ekiro nga talina kyakolako.
Agambye nti kino bakikoze okusobola okutangira abeekalakaasi abayinza okuddamu okuletawo obuvuyo, saako n’okwongera okukwasisa ebiragiro bya kafiyu.
